name: The Good Doctors Ghosts: Ghost Hunters

metadata.name: TGDG Hunter #1
metadata.description: Introducing Ghost Hunters, the official PFP collection for The Good Doctor’s Ghosts project. Show the cryptoverse you’re on official ghost hunting business with a syndicated, algorithmically generated, 1 of 1 from our collection of 5000 avatars. Then participate in the DAO; collect TGDGs and gain access to future events, metaverse utilities, and a stake in community governance.
